subject: Figure Skating
lead_paragraph: Daisuke Takahashi earned a world-record score of 94.00 points in the short program, and Akiko Suzuki was second in the women’s event, giving Japan the lead of the World Team Trophy in Tokyo.
snippet: Daisuke Takahashi earned a world-record score of 94.00 points in the short program, and Akiko Suzuki was second in the women’s event, giving Japan the lead of the World Team Trophy in Tokyo.
